metadata.title: CVE-2024-1151 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was reported in the Open vSwitch sub-component in the LinuxKernel. The flaw occurs when a recursive operation of code push recursivelycalls into the code block. The OVS module does not validate the stackdepth, pushing too many frames and causing a stack overflow. As a result,this can lead to a crash or other related issues.
